00073 /* ************* Marker API **************** */
00074 
00075 /* helper function for getting the list of markers to work on */
00076 static ListBase *context_get_markers(Scene *scene, ScrArea *sa)
00077 {
00078     /* local marker sets... */
00079     if (sa) {
00080         if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) {
00081             SpaceAction *saction = (SpaceAction *)sa->spacedata.first;
00082             
00083             /* local markers can only be shown when there's only a single active action to grab them from 
00084              *  - flag only takes effect when there's an action, otherwise it can get too confusing?
00085              */
00086             if (ELEM(saction->mode, SACTCONT_ACTION, SACTCONT_SHAPEKEY) && (saction->action)) {
00087                 if (saction->flag & SACTION_POSEMARKERS_SHOW) {
00088                     return &saction->action->markers;
00089                 }
00090             }
00091         }
00092     }
00093     
00094     /* default to using the scene's markers */
00095     return &scene->markers;
00096 }
00097 
00098 /* ............. */
00099 
00100 /* public API for getting markers from context */
00101 ListBase *ED_context_get_markers(const bContext *C)
00102 {
00103     return context_get_markers(CTX_data_scene(C), CTX_wm_area(C));
00104 }
00105 
00106 /* public API for getting markers from "animation" context */
00107 ListBase *ED_animcontext_get_markers(const bAnimContext *ac)
00108 {
00109     if (ac)
00110         return context_get_markers(ac->scene, ac->sa);
00111     else
00112         return NULL;
00113 }

00115 /* --------------------------------- */
00116 
00117 /* Apply some transformation to markers after the fact 
00118  * < markers: list of markers to affect - this may or may not be the scene markers list, so don't assume anything
00119  * < scene: current scene (for getting current frame)
00120  * < mode: (TfmMode) transform mode that this transform is for
00121  * < value: from the transform code, this is t->vec[0] (which is delta transform for grab/extend, and scale factor for scale)
00122  * < side: (B/L/R) for 'extend' functionality, which side of current frame to use
00123  */
00124 int ED_markers_post_apply_transform (ListBase *markers, Scene *scene, int mode, float value, char side)
00125 {
00126     TimeMarker *marker;
00127     float cfra = (float)CFRA;
00128     int changed = 0;
00129     
00130     /* sanity check */
00131     if (markers == NULL)
00132         return changed;
00133     
00134     /* affect selected markers - it's unlikely that we will want to affect all in this way? */
00135     for (marker = markers->first; marker; marker = marker->next) {
00136         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00137             switch (mode) {
00138                 case TFM_TIME_TRANSLATE:
00139                 case TFM_TIME_EXTEND:
00140                 {
00141                     /* apply delta if marker is on the right side of the current frame */
00142                     if ((side=='B') ||
00143                         (side=='L' && marker->frame < cfra) || 
00144                         (side=='R' && marker->frame >= cfra))
00145                     {
00146                         marker->frame += (int)floorf(value + 0.5f);
00147                         changed++;
00148                     }
00149                 }
00150                     break;
00151                     
00152                 case TFM_TIME_SCALE:
00153                 {   
00154                     /* rescale the distance between the marker and the current frame */
00155                     marker->frame= cfra + (int)floorf(((float)(marker->frame - cfra) * value) + 0.5f);
00156                     changed++;
00157                 }
00158                     break;
00159             }
00160         }
00161     }
00162     
00163     return changed;
00164 }

00168 /* Get the marker that is closest to this point */
00169 /* XXX for select, the min_dist should be small */
00170 TimeMarker *ED_markers_find_nearest_marker (ListBase *markers, float x) 
00171 {
00172     TimeMarker *marker, *nearest=NULL;
00173     float dist, min_dist= 1000000;
00174     
00175     if (markers) {
00176         for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00177             dist = ABS((float)marker->frame - x);
00178             
00179             if (dist < min_dist) {
00180                 min_dist= dist;
00181                 nearest= marker;
00182             }
00183         }
00184     }
00185     
00186     return nearest;
00187 }
00188 
00189 /* Return the time of the marker that occurs on a frame closest to the given time */
00190 int ED_markers_find_nearest_marker_time (ListBase *markers, float x)
00191 {
00192     TimeMarker *nearest= ED_markers_find_nearest_marker(markers, x);
00193     return (nearest) ? (nearest->frame) : (int)floor(x + 0.5f);
00194 }

00196 
00197 void ED_markers_get_minmax (ListBase *markers, short sel, float *first, float *last)
00198 {
00199     TimeMarker *marker;
00200     float min, max;
00201     int selcount = 0;
00202     
00203     /* sanity check */
00204     //printf("markers = %p -  %p, %p\n", markers, markers->first, markers->last);
00205     if (markers == NULL) {
00206         *first = 0.0f;
00207         *last = 0.0f;
00208         return;
00209     }
00210     
00211     if (markers->first && markers->last) {
00212         TimeMarker *fm= markers->first;
00213         TimeMarker *lm= markers->last;
00214         
00215         min= (float)fm->frame;
00216         max= (float)lm->frame;
00217     }
00218     else {
00219         *first = 0.0f;
00220         *last = 0.0f;
00221         return;
00222     }
00223     
00224     /* count how many markers are usable - see later */
00225     if (sel) {
00226         for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00227             if (marker->flag & SELECT)
00228                 selcount++;
00229         }
00230     }
00231     else
00232         selcount= BLI_countlist(markers);
00233     
00234     /* if only selected are to be considered, only consider the selected ones
00235      * (optimization for not searching list)
00236      */
00237     if (selcount > 1) {
00238         for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00239             if (sel) {
00240                 if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00241                     if (marker->frame < min)
00242                         min= (float)marker->frame;
00243                     if (marker->frame > max)
00244                         max= (float)marker->frame;
00245                 }
00246             }
00247             else {
00248                 if (marker->frame < min)
00249                     min= (float)marker->frame;
00250                 if (marker->frame > max)
00251                     max= (float)marker->frame;
00252             }   
00253         }
00254     }
00255     
00256     /* set the min/max values */
00257     *first= min;
00258     *last= max;
00259 }

00263 /* Adds a marker to list of cfra elems */
00264 static void add_marker_to_cfra_elem(ListBase *lb, TimeMarker *marker, short only_sel)
00265 {
00266     CfraElem *ce, *cen;
00267     
00268     /* should this one only be considered if it is selected? */
00269     if ((only_sel) && ((marker->flag & SELECT)==0))
00270         return;
00271     
00272     /* insertion sort - try to find a previous cfra elem */
00273     for (ce= lb->first; ce; ce= ce->next) {
00274         if (ce->cfra == marker->frame) {
00275             /* do because of double keys */
00276             if (marker->flag & SELECT) 
00277                 ce->sel= marker->flag;
00278             return;
00279         }
00280         else if (ce->cfra > marker->frame) break;
00281     }   
00282     
00283     cen= MEM_callocN(sizeof(CfraElem), "add_to_cfra_elem"); 
00284     if (ce) BLI_insertlinkbefore(lb, ce, cen);
00285     else BLI_addtail(lb, cen);
00286 
00287     cen->cfra= marker->frame;
00288     cen->sel= marker->flag;
00289 }
00290 
00291 /* This function makes a list of all the markers. The only_sel
00292  * argument is used to specify whether only the selected markers
00293  * are added.
00294  */
00295 void ED_markers_make_cfra_list(ListBase *markers, ListBase *lb, short only_sel)
00296 {
00297     TimeMarker *marker;
00298     
00299     if (markers == NULL)
00300         return;
00301     
00302     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next)
00303         add_marker_to_cfra_elem(lb, marker, only_sel);
00304 }

00308 /* Get the first selected marker */
00309 TimeMarker *ED_markers_get_first_selected(ListBase *markers)
00310 {
00311     TimeMarker *marker;
00312     
00313     if (markers) {
00314         for (marker = markers->first; marker; marker = marker->next) {
00315             if (marker->flag & SELECT)
00316                 return marker;
00317         }
00318     }
00319     
00320     return NULL;
00321 }

00325 /* Print debugging prints of list of markers 
00326  * BSI's: do NOT make static or put in if-defs as "unused code". That's too much trouble when we need to use for quick debugging!
00327  */
00328 void debug_markers_print_list(ListBase *markers)
00329 {
00330     TimeMarker *marker;
00331     
00332     if (markers == NULL) {
00333         printf("No markers list to print debug for\n");
00334         return;
00335     }
00336     
00337     printf("List of markers follows: -----\n");
00338     
00339     for (marker = markers->first; marker; marker = marker->next) {
00340         printf("\t'%s' on %d at %p with %u\n", marker->name, marker->frame, (void *)marker, marker->flag);
00341     }
00342     
00343     printf("End of list ------------------\n");
00344 }

00346 /* ************* Marker Drawing ************ */
00347 
00348 /* function to draw markers */
00349 static void draw_marker(View2D *v2d, TimeMarker *marker, int cfra, int flag)
00350 {
00351     float xpos, ypixels, xscale, yscale;
00352     int icon_id= 0;
00353     
00354     xpos = marker->frame;
00355     
00356     /* no time correction for framelen! space is drawn with old values */
00357     ypixels= v2d->mask.ymax-v2d->mask.ymin;
00358     UI_view2d_getscale(v2d, &xscale, &yscale);
00359     
00360     glScalef(1.0f/xscale, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00361     
00362     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00363     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);          
00364     
00365     /* vertical line - dotted */
00366 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
00367     if ((marker->camera) || (flag & DRAW_MARKERS_LINES))
00368 #else
00369     if (flag & DRAW_MARKERS_LINES)
00370 #endif
00371     {
00372         setlinestyle(3);
00373         
00374         if (marker->flag & SELECT)
00375             glColor4ub(255, 255, 255, 96);
00376         else
00377             glColor4ub(0, 0, 0, 96);
00378         
00379         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00380             glVertex2f((xpos*xscale)+0.5f, 12.0f);
00381             glVertex2f((xpos*xscale)+0.5f, (v2d->cur.ymax+12.0f)*yscale);
00382         glEnd();
00383         
00384         setlinestyle(0);
00385     }
00386     
00387     /* 5 px to offset icon to align properly, space / pixels corrects for zoom */
00388     if (flag & DRAW_MARKERS_LOCAL) {
00389         icon_id= (marker->flag & ACTIVE) ? ICON_PMARKER_ACT : 
00390         (marker->flag & SELECT) ? ICON_PMARKER_SEL : 
00391         ICON_PMARKER;
00392     }
00393     else {
00394         icon_id= (marker->flag & SELECT) ? ICON_MARKER_HLT : 
00395         ICON_MARKER;
00396     }
00397     
00398     UI_icon_draw(xpos*xscale-5.0f, 16.0f, icon_id);
00399     
00400     glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00401     
00402     /* and the marker name too, shifted slightly to the top-right */
00403     if (marker->name && marker->name[0]) {
00404         float x, y;
00405         
00406         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00407             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT_HI);
00408             x= xpos*xscale + 4.0f;
00409             y= (ypixels <= 39.0f)? (ypixels-10.0f) : 29.0f;
00410         }
00411         else {
00412             UI_ThemeColor(TH_TEXT);
00413             if ((marker->frame <= cfra) && (marker->frame+5 > cfra)) {
00414                 x= xpos*xscale + 4.0f;
00415                 y= (ypixels <= 39.0f)? (ypixels - 10.0f) : 29.0f;
00416             }
00417             else {
00418                 x= xpos*xscale + 4.0f;
00419                 y= 17.0f;
00420             }
00421         }
00422 
00423 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
00424         if (marker->camera && (marker->camera->restrictflag & OB_RESTRICT_RENDER)) {
00425             float col[4];
00426             glGetFloatv(GL_CURRENT_COLOR, col);
00427             col[3]= 0.4;
00428             glColor4fv(col);
00429         }
00430 #endif
00431 
00432         UI_DrawString(x, y, marker->name);
00433     }
00434     
00435     glScalef(xscale, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00436 }
00437 
00438 /* Draw Scene-Markers in time window */
00439 void draw_markers_time(const bContext *C, int flag)
00440 {
00441     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
00442     View2D *v2d;
00443     TimeMarker *marker;
00444     Scene *scene;
00445 
00446     if (markers == NULL)
00447         return;
00448 
00449     scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00450     v2d = UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
00451 
00452     /* unselected markers are drawn at the first time */
00453     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00454         if ((marker->flag & SELECT) == 0) {
00455             draw_marker(v2d, marker, scene->r.cfra, flag);
00456         }
00457     }
00458     
00459     /* selected markers are drawn later */
00460     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00461         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00462             draw_marker(v2d, marker, scene->r.cfra, flag);
00463         }
00464     }
00465 }

00467 /* ************************ Marker Wrappers API ********************* */
00468 /* These wrappers allow marker operators to function within the confines 
00469  * of standard animation editors, such that they can coexist with the 
00470  * primary operations of those editors.
00471  */
00472 
00473 /* ------------------------ */
00474 
00475 /* special poll() which checks if there are selected markers first */
00476 static int ed_markers_poll_selected_markers(bContext *C)
00477 {
00478     ListBase *markers = ED_context_get_markers(C);
00479     
00480     /* first things first: markers can only exist in timeline views */
00481     if (ED_operator_animview_active(C) == 0)
00482         return 0;
00483         
00484     /* check if some marker is selected */
00485     return ED_markers_get_first_selected(markers) != NULL;
00486 }
00487 
00488 /* special poll() which checks if there are any markers at all first */
00489 static int ed_markers_poll_markers_exist(bContext *C)
00490 {
00491     ListBase *markers = ED_context_get_markers(C);
00492     
00493     /* first things first: markers can only exist in timeline views */
00494     if (ED_operator_animview_active(C) == 0)
00495         return 0;
00496         
00497     /* list of markers must exist, as well as some markers in it! */
00498     return (markers && markers->first);
00499 }
00500  
00501 /* ------------------------ */ 
00502 
00503 /* Second-tier invoke() callback that performs context validation before running the  
00504  * "custom"/third-tier invoke() callback supplied as the last arg (which would normally
00505  * be the operator's invoke() callback elsewhere)
00506  *
00507  * < invoke_func: (fn(bContext*, wmOperator*, wmEvent*)=int) "standard" invoke function 
00508  *          that operator would otherwise have used. If NULL, the operator's standard
00509  *          exec() callback will be called instead in the appropriate places.
00510  */
00511 static int ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt, 
00512         int (*invoke_func)(bContext*,wmOperator*,wmEvent*))
00513 {
00514     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
00515     int retval = OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00516     
00517     /* removed check for Y coord of event, keymap has bounbox now */
00518     
00519     /* allow operator to run now */
00520     if (invoke_func)
00521         retval = invoke_func(C, op, evt);
00522     else if (op->type->exec)
00523         retval = op->type->exec(C, op);
00524     else
00525         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Programming error: operator doesn't actually have code to do anything!");
00526         
00527     /* return status modifications - for now, make this spacetype dependent as above */
00528     if (sa->spacetype != SPACE_TIME) {
00529         /* unless successful, must add "pass-through" to let normal operator's have a chance at tackling this event */
00530         if (retval != OPERATOR_FINISHED)
00531             retval |= OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00532     }
00533     
00534     return retval;
00535 }
00536 
00537 /* standard wrapper - first-tier invoke() callback to be directly assigned to operator typedata
00538  * for operators which don't need any special invoke calls. Any operators with special invoke calls
00539  * though will need to implement their own wrapper which calls the second-tier callback themselves
00540  * (passing through the custom invoke function they use)
00541  */
00542 static int ed_markers_opwrap_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00543 {
00544     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, NULL);
00545 }
00546 
00547 /* ************************** add markers *************************** */
00548 
00549 /* add TimeMarker at curent frame */
00550 static int ed_marker_add(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00551 {
00552     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
00553     TimeMarker *marker;
00554     int frame= CTX_data_scene(C)->r.cfra;
00555     
00556     if (markers == NULL)
00557         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00558     
00559     /* prefer not having 2 markers at the same place,
00560      * though the user can move them to overlap once added */
00561     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00562         if (marker->frame == frame) 
00563             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00564     }
00565     
00566     /* deselect all */
00567     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next)
00568         marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
00569     
00570     marker = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TimeMarker), "TimeMarker");
00571     marker->flag= SELECT;
00572     marker->frame= frame;
00573     BLI_snprintf(marker->name, sizeof(marker->name), "F_%02d", frame); // XXX - temp code only
00574     BLI_addtail(markers, marker);
00575     
00576     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00577     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00578     
00579     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00580 }
00581 
00582 static void MARKER_OT_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00583 {
00584     /* identifiers */
00585     ot->name = "Add Time Marker";
00586     ot->description = "Add a new time marker";
00587     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_add";
00588     
00589     /* api callbacks */
00590     ot->exec = ed_marker_add;
00591     ot->invoke = ed_markers_opwrap_invoke;
00592     ot->poll = ED_operator_animview_active;
00593     
00594     /* flags */
00595     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00596 }
00597 
00598 /* ************************** transform markers *************************** */
00599 
00600 /* operator state vars used:  
00601  *     frs: delta movement
00602  * 
00603  * functions:
00604  * 
00605  *     init()   check selection, add customdata with old values and some lookups
00606  * 
00607  *     apply()  do the actual movement
00608  * 
00609  *     exit()    cleanup, send notifier
00610  * 
00611  *     cancel() to escape from modal
00612  * 
00613  * callbacks:
00614  * 
00615  *     exec()    calls init, apply, exit 
00616  * 
00617  *     invoke() calls init, adds modal handler
00618  * 
00619  *     modal()    accept modal events while doing it, ends with apply and exit, or cancel
00620  * 
00621  */
00622 
00623 typedef struct MarkerMove {
00624     SpaceLink *slink;
00625     ListBase *markers;
00626     int event_type;     /* store invoke-event, to verify */
00627     int *oldframe, evtx, firstx;
00628     NumInput num;
00629 } MarkerMove;
00630 
00631 /* copy selection to temp buffer */
00632 /* return 0 if not OK */
00633 static int ed_marker_move_init(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00634 {
00635     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
00636     MarkerMove *mm;
00637     TimeMarker *marker;
00638     int totmark=0;
00639     int a;
00640 
00641     if (markers == NULL) return 0;
00642     
00643     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next)
00644         if (marker->flag & SELECT) totmark++;
00645     
00646     if (totmark==0) return 0;
00647     
00648     op->customdata= mm= MEM_callocN(sizeof(MarkerMove), "Markermove");
00649     mm->slink= CTX_wm_space_data(C);
00650     mm->markers= markers;
00651     mm->oldframe= MEM_callocN(totmark*sizeof(int), "MarkerMove oldframe");
00652 
00653     initNumInput(&mm->num);
00654     mm->num.idx_max = 0; /* one axis */
00655     mm->num.flag |= NUM_NO_FRACTION;
00656     mm->num.increment = 1.0f;
00657     
00658     for (a=0, marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00659         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00660             mm->oldframe[a]= marker->frame;
00661             a++;
00662         }
00663     }
00664     
00665     return 1;
00666 }
00667 
00668 /* free stuff */
00669 static void ed_marker_move_exit(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00670 {
00671     MarkerMove *mm= op->customdata;
00672     
00673     /* free data */
00674     MEM_freeN(mm->oldframe);
00675     MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
00676     op->customdata= NULL;
00677     
00678     /* clear custom header prints */
00679     ED_area_headerprint(CTX_wm_area(C), NULL);
00680 }
00681 
00682 static int ed_marker_move_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00683 {
00684     if (ed_marker_move_init(C, op)) {
00685         MarkerMove *mm= op->customdata;
00686         
00687         mm->evtx= evt->x;
00688         mm->firstx= evt->x;
00689         mm->event_type= evt->type;
00690         
00691         /* add temp handler */
00692         WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
00693         
00694         /* reset frs delta */
00695         RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frames", 0);
00696         
00697         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00698     }
00699     
00700     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00701 }
00702 
00703 static int ed_marker_move_invoke_wrapper(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00704 {
00705     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, ed_marker_move_invoke);
00706 }
00707 
00708 /* note, init has to be called succesfully */
00709 static void ed_marker_move_apply(wmOperator *op)
00710 {
00711     MarkerMove *mm= op->customdata;
00712     TimeMarker *marker;
00713     int a, offs;
00714     
00715     offs= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "frames");
00716     for (a=0, marker= mm->markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00717         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00718             marker->frame= mm->oldframe[a] + offs;
00719             a++;
00720         }
00721     }
00722 }
00723 
00724 /* only for modal */
00725 static int ed_marker_move_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00726 {
00727     RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frames", 0);
00728     ed_marker_move_apply(op);
00729     ed_marker_move_exit(C, op); 
00730     
00731     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00732     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00733 
00734     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00735 }
00736 
00737 
00738 
00739 static int ed_marker_move_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00740 {
00741     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00742     MarkerMove *mm= op->customdata;
00743     View2D *v2d= UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
00744     TimeMarker *marker, *selmarker=NULL;
00745     float dx, fac;
00746     char str[256];
00747         
00748     switch(evt->type) {
00749         case ESCKEY:
00750             ed_marker_move_cancel(C, op);
00751             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00752         
00753         case RIGHTMOUSE:
00754             /* press = user manually demands transform to be canceled */
00755             if (evt->val == KM_PRESS) {
00756                 ed_marker_move_cancel(C, op);
00757                 return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00758             }
00759             /* else continue; <--- see if release event should be caught for tweak-end */
00760         
00761         case RETKEY:
00762         case PADENTER:
00763         case LEFTMOUSE:
00764         case MIDDLEMOUSE:
00765             if (WM_modal_tweak_exit(evt, mm->event_type)) {
00766                 ed_marker_move_exit(C, op);
00767                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00768                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00769                 return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00770             }
00771             break;
00772         case MOUSEMOVE:
00773             if (hasNumInput(&mm->num))
00774                 break;
00775             
00776             dx= v2d->mask.xmax-v2d->mask.xmin;
00777             dx= (v2d->cur.xmax-v2d->cur.xmin)/dx;
00778             
00779             if (evt->x != mm->evtx) {   /* XXX maybe init for firsttime */
00780                 int a, offs, totmark=0;
00781                 
00782                 mm->evtx= evt->x;
00783                 
00784                 fac= ((float)(evt->x - mm->firstx)*dx);
00785                 
00786                 if (mm->slink->spacetype == SPACE_TIME) 
00787                     apply_keyb_grid(evt->shift, evt->ctrl, &fac, 0.0, FPS, 0.1*FPS, 0);
00788                 else
00789                     apply_keyb_grid(evt->shift, evt->ctrl, &fac, 0.0, 1.0, 0.1, 0 /*was: U.flag & USER_AUTOGRABGRID*/);
00790                 
00791                 offs= (int)fac;
00792                 RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frames", offs);
00793                 ed_marker_move_apply(op);
00794                 
00795                 /* cruft below is for header print */
00796                 for (a=0, marker= mm->markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00797                     if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00798                         selmarker= marker;
00799                         a++; totmark++;
00800                     }
00801                 }
00802                 
00803                 if (totmark==1) {   
00804                     /* we print current marker value */
00805                     if (mm->slink->spacetype == SPACE_TIME) {
00806                         SpaceTime *stime= (SpaceTime *)mm->slink;
00807                         if (stime->flag & TIME_DRAWFRAMES) 
00808                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker %d offset %d", selmarker->frame, offs);
00809                         else 
00810                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker %.2f offset %.2f", FRA2TIME(selmarker->frame), FRA2TIME(offs));
00811                     }
00812                     else if (mm->slink->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) {
00813                         SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)mm->slink;
00814                         if (saction->flag & SACTION_DRAWTIME)
00815                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker %.2f offset %.2f", FRA2TIME(selmarker->frame), FRA2TIME(offs));
00816                         else
00817                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker %.2f offset %.2f", (double)(selmarker->frame), (double)(offs));
00818                     }
00819                     else {
00820                         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker %.2f offset %.2f", (double)(selmarker->frame), (double)(offs));
00821                     }
00822                 }
00823                 else {
00824                     /* we only print the offset */
00825                     if (mm->slink->spacetype == SPACE_TIME) { 
00826                         SpaceTime *stime= (SpaceTime *)mm->slink;
00827                         if (stime->flag & TIME_DRAWFRAMES) 
00828                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker offset %d ", offs);
00829                         else 
00830                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker offset %.2f ", FRA2TIME(offs));
00831                     }
00832                     else if (mm->slink->spacetype == SPACE_ACTION) {
00833                         SpaceAction *saction= (SpaceAction *)mm->slink;
00834                         if (saction->flag & SACTION_DRAWTIME)
00835                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker offset %.2f ", FRA2TIME(offs));
00836                         else
00837                             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker offset %.2f ", (double)(offs));
00838                     }
00839                     else {
00840                         BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker offset %.2f ", (double)(offs));
00841                     }
00842                 }
00843                 
00844                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00845                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00846                 ED_area_headerprint(CTX_wm_area(C), str);
00847             }
00848     }
00849 
00850     if (evt->val==KM_PRESS) {
00851         float vec[3];
00852         char str_tx[256];
00853         
00854         if (handleNumInput(&mm->num, evt)) {
00855             applyNumInput(&mm->num, vec);
00856             outputNumInput(&mm->num, str_tx);
00857             
00858             RNA_int_set(op->ptr, "frames", vec[0]);
00859             ed_marker_move_apply(op);
00860             // ed_marker_header_update(C, op, str, (int)vec[0]);
00861             // strcat(str, str_tx);
00862             BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "Marker offset %s", str_tx);
00863             ED_area_headerprint(CTX_wm_area(C), str);
00864             
00865             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00866             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
00867         }
00868     }
00869 
00870     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00871 }
00872 
00873 static int ed_marker_move_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00874 {
00875     if (ed_marker_move_init(C, op)) {
00876         ed_marker_move_apply(op);
00877         ed_marker_move_exit(C, op);
00878         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00879     }
00880     return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
00881 }
00882 
00883 static void MARKER_OT_move(wmOperatorType *ot)
00884 {
00885     /* identifiers */
00886     ot->name = "Move Time Marker";
00887     ot->description = "Move selected time marker(s)";
00888     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_move";
00889     
00890     /* api callbacks */
00891     ot->exec = ed_marker_move_exec;
00892     ot->invoke = ed_marker_move_invoke_wrapper;
00893     ot->modal = ed_marker_move_modal;
00894     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_selected_markers;
00895     ot->cancel = ed_marker_move_cancel;
00896     
00897     /* flags */
00898     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO|OPTYPE_BLOCKING|OPTYPE_GRAB_POINTER;
00899     
00900     /* rna storage */
00901     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "frames", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Frames", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00902 }
00903 
00904 /* ************************** duplicate markers *************************** */
00905 
00906 /* operator state vars used:
00907  *     frs: delta movement
00908  *
00909  * functions:
00910  *
00911  *     apply()  do the actual duplicate
00912  *
00913  * callbacks:
00914  *
00915  *     exec()    calls apply, move_exec
00916  *
00917  *     invoke() calls apply, move_invoke
00918  *
00919  *     modal()    uses move_modal
00920  */
00921 
00922 /* duplicate selected TimeMarkers */
00923 static void ed_marker_duplicate_apply(bContext *C)
00924 {
00925     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
00926     TimeMarker *marker, *newmarker;
00927     
00928     if (markers == NULL) 
00929         return;
00930 
00931     /* go through the list of markers, duplicate selected markers and add duplicated copies
00932      * to the beginning of the list (unselect original markers)
00933      */
00934     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
00935         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
00936             /* unselect selected marker */
00937             marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
00938             
00939             /* create and set up new marker */
00940             newmarker = MEM_callocN(sizeof(TimeMarker), "TimeMarker");
00941             newmarker->flag= SELECT;
00942             newmarker->frame= marker->frame;
00943             BLI_strncpy(newmarker->name, marker->name, sizeof(marker->name));
00944             
00945 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
00946             newmarker->camera= marker->camera;
00947 #endif
00948 
00949             /* new marker is added to the beginning of list */
00950             // FIXME: bad ordering!
00951             BLI_addhead(markers, newmarker);
00952         }
00953     }
00954 }
00955 
00956 static int ed_marker_duplicate_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00957 {
00958     ed_marker_duplicate_apply(C);
00959     ed_marker_move_exec(C, op); /* assumes frs delta set */
00960     
00961     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00962     
00963 }
00964 
00965 static int ed_marker_duplicate_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00966 {
00967     ed_marker_duplicate_apply(C);
00968     return ed_marker_move_invoke(C, op, evt);
00969 }
00970 
00971 static int ed_marker_duplicate_invoke_wrapper(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00972 {
00973     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, ed_marker_duplicate_invoke);
00974 }
00975 
00976 static void MARKER_OT_duplicate(wmOperatorType *ot)
00977 {
00978     /* identifiers */
00979     ot->name = "Duplicate Time Marker";
00980     ot->description = "Duplicate selected time marker(s)";
00981     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_duplicate";
00982     
00983     /* api callbacks */
00984     ot->exec = ed_marker_duplicate_exec;
00985     ot->invoke = ed_marker_duplicate_invoke_wrapper;
00986     ot->modal = ed_marker_move_modal;
00987     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_selected_markers;
00988     ot->cancel = ed_marker_move_cancel;
00989     
00990     /* flags */
00991     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00992     
00993     /* rna storage */
00994     RNA_def_int(ot->srna, "frames", 0, INT_MIN, INT_MAX, "Frames", "", INT_MIN, INT_MAX);
00995 }
00996 
00997 /* ************************** selection ************************************/
00998 
00999 /* select/deselect TimeMarker at current frame */
01000 static void select_timeline_marker_frame(ListBase *markers, int frame, unsigned char shift)
01001 {
01002     TimeMarker *marker;
01003     int select=0;
01004     
01005     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
01006         /* if Shift is not set, then deselect Markers */
01007         if (!shift) marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
01008         
01009         /* this way a not-shift select will allways give 1 selected marker */
01010         if ((marker->frame == frame) && (!select)) {
01011             if (marker->flag & SELECT) 
01012                 marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
01013             else
01014                 marker->flag |= SELECT;
01015             select = 1;
01016         }
01017     }
01018 }
01019 
01020 static int ed_marker_select(bContext *C, wmEvent *evt, int extend, int camera)
01021 {
01022     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
01023     View2D *v2d= UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
01024     float viewx;
01025     int x, y, cfra;
01026     
01027     if (markers == NULL)
01028         return OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01029 
01030     x= evt->x - CTX_wm_region(C)->winrct.xmin;
01031     y= evt->y - CTX_wm_region(C)->winrct.ymin;
01032     
01033     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, x, y, &viewx, NULL);  
01034     
01035     cfra= ED_markers_find_nearest_marker_time(markers, viewx);
01036     
01037     if (extend)
01038         select_timeline_marker_frame(markers, cfra, 1);
01039     else
01040         select_timeline_marker_frame(markers, cfra, 0);
01041     
01042 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01043 
01044     if (camera) {
01045         Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01046         Base *base;
01047         TimeMarker *marker;
01048         int sel= 0;
01049         
01050         if (!extend)
01051             scene_deselect_all(scene);
01052         
01053         for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
01054             if (marker->frame==cfra) {
01055                 sel= (marker->flag & SELECT);
01056                 break;
01057             }
01058         }
01059         
01060         for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
01061             if (marker->camera) {
01062                 if (marker->frame==cfra) {
01063                     base= object_in_scene(marker->camera, scene);
01064                     if (base) {
01065                         ED_base_object_select(base, sel);
01066                         if (sel)
01067                             ED_base_object_activate(C, base);
01068                     }
01069                 }
01070             }
01071         }
01072         
01073         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_OB_SELECT, scene);
01074     }
01075 #else
01076     (void)camera;
01077 #endif
01078 
01079     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01080     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01081 
01082     /* allowing tweaks, but needs OPERATOR_FINISHED, otherwise renaming fails... [#25987] */
01083     return OPERATOR_FINISHED|OPERATOR_PASS_THROUGH;
01084 }
01085 
01086 static int ed_marker_select_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
01087 {
01088     short extend= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
01089     short camera= 0;
01090 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01091     camera= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "camera");
01092 #endif
01093     return ed_marker_select(C, evt, extend, camera);
01094 }
01095 
01096 static int ed_marker_select_invoke_wrapper(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
01097 {
01098     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, ed_marker_select_invoke);
01099 }
01100 
01101 static void MARKER_OT_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
01102 {
01103     /* identifiers */
01104     ot->name = "Select Time Marker";
01105     ot->description = "Select time marker(s)";
01106     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_select";
01107     
01108     /* api callbacks */
01109     ot->invoke = ed_marker_select_invoke_wrapper;
01110     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_markers_exist;
01111     
01112     /* flags */
01113     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01114 
01115     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "extend", 0, "Extend", "Extend the selection");
01116 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01117     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "camera", 0, "Camera", "Select the camera");
01118 #endif
01119 }
01120 
01121 /* *************************** border select markers **************** */
01122 
01123 /* operator state vars used: (added by default WM callbacks)   
01124  * xmin, ymin
01125  * xmax, ymax
01126  *
01127  * customdata: the wmGesture pointer, with subwindow
01128  *
01129  * callbacks:
01130  *
01131  *  exec()  has to be filled in by user
01132  *
01133  *  invoke() default WM function
01134  *          adds modal handler
01135  *
01136  *  modal() default WM function 
01137  *          accept modal events while doing it, calls exec(), handles ESC and border drawing
01138  *
01139  *  poll()  has to be filled in by user for context
01140  */
01141 
01142 static int ed_marker_border_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01143 {
01144     View2D *v2d= UI_view2d_fromcontext(C);
01145     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
01146     TimeMarker *marker;
01147     float xminf, xmaxf, yminf, ymaxf;
01148     int gesture_mode= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "gesture_mode");
01149     int xmin= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmin");
01150     int xmax= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "xmax");
01151     int ymin= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymin");
01152     int ymax= RNA_int_get(op->ptr, "ymax");
01153     int extend= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "extend");
01154     
01155     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, xmin, ymin, &xminf, &yminf);  
01156     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, xmax, ymax, &xmaxf, &ymaxf);  
01157     
01158     if (markers == NULL)
01159         return 0;
01160     
01161     /* XXX marker context */
01162     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
01163         if ((marker->frame > xminf) && (marker->frame <= xmaxf)) {
01164             switch (gesture_mode) {
01165                 case GESTURE_MODAL_SELECT:
01166                     marker->flag |= SELECT;
01167                     break;
01168                 case GESTURE_MODAL_DESELECT:
01169                     marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
01170                     break;
01171             }
01172         }
01173         else if (!extend) {
01174             marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
01175         }
01176     }
01177     
01178     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01179     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01180 
01181     return 1;
01182 }
01183 
01184 static int ed_marker_select_border_invoke_wrapper(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
01185 {
01186     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, WM_border_select_invoke);
01187 }
01188 
01189 static void MARKER_OT_select_border(wmOperatorType *ot)
01190 {
01191     /* identifiers */
01192     ot->name = "Marker Border select";
01193     ot->description = "Select all time markers using border selection";
01194     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_select_border";
01195     
01196     /* api callbacks */
01197     ot->exec = ed_marker_border_select_exec;
01198     ot->invoke = ed_marker_select_border_invoke_wrapper;
01199     ot->modal = WM_border_select_modal;
01200     ot->cancel = WM_border_select_cancel;
01201     
01202     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_markers_exist;
01203     
01204     /* flags */
01205     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01206     
01207     /* rna */
01208     WM_operator_properties_gesture_border(ot, TRUE);
01209 }
01210 
01211 /* *********************** (de)select all ***************** */
01212 
01213 static int ed_marker_select_all_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01214 {
01215     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
01216     TimeMarker *marker;
01217     int action = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "action");
01218 
01219     if (markers == NULL)
01220         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01221 
01222     if (action == SEL_TOGGLE) {
01223         action = (ED_markers_get_first_selected(markers) != NULL) ? SEL_DESELECT : SEL_SELECT;
01224     }
01225     
01226     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
01227         switch (action) {
01228         case SEL_SELECT:
01229             marker->flag |= SELECT;
01230             break;
01231         case SEL_DESELECT:
01232             marker->flag &= ~SELECT;
01233             break;
01234         case SEL_INVERT:
01235             marker->flag ^= SELECT;
01236             break;
01237         }
01238     }
01239     
01240     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01241     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01242 
01243     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01244 }
01245 
01246 static void MARKER_OT_select_all(wmOperatorType *ot)
01247 {
01248     /* identifiers */
01249     ot->name = "(De)select all markers";
01250     ot->description = "Change selection of all time markers";
01251     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_select_all";
01252     
01253     /* api callbacks */
01254     ot->exec = ed_marker_select_all_exec;
01255     ot->invoke = ed_markers_opwrap_invoke;
01256     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_markers_exist;
01257     
01258     /* flags */
01259     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01260     
01261     /* rna */
01262     WM_operator_properties_select_all(ot);
01263 }
01264 
01265 /* ***************** remove marker *********************** */
01266 
01267 /* remove selected TimeMarkers */
01268 static int ed_marker_delete_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01269 {
01270     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
01271     TimeMarker *marker, *nmarker;
01272     short changed= 0;
01273     
01274     if (markers == NULL)
01275         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01276     
01277     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= nmarker) {
01278         nmarker= marker->next;
01279         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
01280             BLI_freelinkN(markers, marker);
01281             changed= 1;
01282         }
01283     }
01284     
01285     if (changed) {
01286         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01287         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01288     }
01289     
01290     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01291 }
01292 
01293 static int ed_marker_delete_invoke_wrapper(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
01294 {
01295     // XXX: must we keep these confirmations?
01296     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, WM_operator_confirm);
01297 }
01298 
01299 static void MARKER_OT_delete(wmOperatorType *ot)
01300 {
01301     /* identifiers */
01302     ot->name = "Delete Markers";
01303     ot->description = "Delete selected time marker(s)";
01304     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_delete";
01305     
01306     /* api callbacks */
01307     ot->invoke = ed_marker_delete_invoke_wrapper;
01308     ot->exec = ed_marker_delete_exec;
01309     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_selected_markers;
01310     
01311     /* flags */
01312     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO; 
01313 }
01314 
01315 
01316 /* **************** rename marker ***************** */
01317 
01318 /* rename first selected TimeMarker */
01319 static int ed_marker_rename_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01320 {
01321     TimeMarker *marker= ED_markers_get_first_selected(ED_context_get_markers(C));
01322 
01323     if (marker) {
01324         RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "name", marker->name);
01325         
01326         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01327         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01328         
01329         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01330     }
01331     else {
01332         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01333     }
01334 }
01335 
01336 static int ed_marker_rename_invoke_wrapper(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
01337 {
01338     /* must initialize the marker name first if there is a marker selected */
01339     TimeMarker *marker = ED_markers_get_first_selected(ED_context_get_markers(C));
01340     if (marker)
01341         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "name", marker->name);
01342     
01343     /* now see if the operator is usable */
01344     return ed_markers_opwrap_invoke_custom(C, op, evt, WM_operator_props_popup);
01345 }

01347 static void MARKER_OT_rename(wmOperatorType *ot)
01348 {
01349     /* identifiers */
01350     ot->name = "Rename Marker";
01351     ot->description = "Rename first selected time marker";
01352     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_rename";
01353     
01354     /* api callbacks */
01355     ot->invoke = ed_marker_rename_invoke_wrapper;
01356     ot->exec = ed_marker_rename_exec;
01357     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_selected_markers;
01358     
01359     /* flags */
01360     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO; 
01361     
01362     /* properties */
01363     ot->prop = RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "name", "RenamedMarker", sizeof(((TimeMarker *)NULL)->name), "Name", "New name for marker");
01364     //RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "ensure_unique", 0, "Ensure Unique", "Ensure that new name is unique within collection of markers");
01365 }
01366 
01367 /* **************** make links to scene ***************** */
01368 
01369 static int ed_marker_make_links_scene_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01370 {
01371     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
01372     Scene *scene_to= BLI_findlink(&CTX_data_main(C)->scene, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "scene"));
01373     TimeMarker *marker, *marker_new;
01374 
01375     if (scene_to==NULL) {
01376         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Scene not found");
01377         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01378     }
01379 
01380     if (scene_to == CTX_data_scene(C)) {
01381         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Can't re-link markers into the same scene");
01382         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01383     }
01384 
01385     /* copy markers */
01386     for (marker= markers->first; marker; marker= marker->next) {
01387         if (marker->flag & SELECT) {
01388             marker_new= MEM_dupallocN(marker);
01389             marker_new->prev= marker_new->next = NULL;
01390             
01391             BLI_addtail(&scene_to->markers, marker_new);
01392         }
01393     }
01394 
01395     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01396 }
01397 
01398 static void MARKER_OT_make_links_scene(wmOperatorType *ot)
01399 {
01400     PropertyRNA *prop;
01401 
01402     /* identifiers */
01403     ot->name = "Make Links to Scene";
01404     ot->description = "Copy selected markers to another scene";
01405     ot->idname = "MARKER_OT_make_links_scene";
01406 
01407     /* api callbacks */
01408     ot->exec = ed_marker_make_links_scene_exec;
01409     ot->invoke = ed_markers_opwrap_invoke;
01410     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_selected_markers;
01411 
01412     /* flags */
01413     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01414 
01415     /* properties */
01416     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "scene", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Scene", "");
01417     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, RNA_scene_itemf);
01418     ot->prop = prop;
01419 
01420 }
01421 
01422 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01423 /* ******************************* camera bind marker ***************** */
01424 
01425 static int ed_marker_camera_bind_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01426 {
01427     bScreen *sc= CTX_wm_screen(C);
01428     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01429     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
01430     ListBase *markers= ED_context_get_markers(C);
01431     TimeMarker *marker;
01432 
01433     marker= ED_markers_get_first_selected(markers);
01434     if (marker == NULL)
01435         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01436 
01437     marker->camera= ob;
01438 
01439     /* camera may have changes */
01440     scene_camera_switch_update(scene);
01441     BKE_screen_view3d_scene_sync(sc);
01442 
01443     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01444     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_MARKERS, NULL);
01445     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|NA_EDITED, scene); /* so we get view3d redraws */
01446 
01447     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01448 }
01449

01459     ot->invoke = ed_markers_opwrap_invoke;
01460     ot->poll = ed_markers_poll_selected_markers;
01461 
01462     /* flags */
01463     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01464 }
01465 #endif

01470 void ED_operatortypes_marker(void)
01471 {
01472     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_add);
01473     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_move);
01474     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_duplicate);
01475     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_select);
01476     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_select_border);
01477     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_select_all);
01478     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_delete);
01479     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_rename);
01480     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_make_links_scene);
01481 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01482     WM_operatortype_append(MARKER_OT_camera_bind);
01483 #endif
01484 }
01485 
01486 /* called in screen_ops.c:ED_keymap_screen() */
01487 void ED_marker_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
01488 {
01489     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Markers", 0, 0);
01490     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
01491     
01492     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_add", MKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01493     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_move", EVT_TWEAK_S, KM_ANY, 0, 0);
01494     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_duplicate", DKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
01495     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01496     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
01497     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
01498 
01499 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01500     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
01501     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", FALSE);
01502     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "camera", TRUE);
01503 
01504     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_select", SELECTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT|KM_CTRL, 0);
01505     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "extend", TRUE);
01506     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "camera", TRUE);
01507 #else
01508     (void)kmi;
01509 #endif
01510     
01511     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_select_border", BKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01512     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_select_all", AKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01513     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_delete", XKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01514     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_delete", DELKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01515     WM_keymap_verify_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_rename", MKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
01516     
01517     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_move", GKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01518 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
01519     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_camera_bind", BKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
01520 #endif
01521 }
01522 
01523 /* to be called from animation editor keymaps, see note below */
01524 void ED_marker_keymap_animedit_conflictfree(wmKeyMap *keymap)
01525 {
01526     /* duplicate of some marker-hotkeys but without the bounds checking
01527      * since these are handy to be able to do unrestricted and won't conflict
01528      * with primary function hotkeys (Usability tweak [#27469])
01529      */
01530     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_add", MKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
01531     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "MARKER_OT_rename", MKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
01532 }
